name: Reaper's Tree
description:
You mustn't allow the Great Tree to perish.
Use your hoe to work the soil and strike your enemies.
Fallen insects will drop new seeds.
They will reap what you sow.

With enough dedication, the Great Tree can be fully restored.
Balance can be returned to the Garden of Death.

Controls:
Movement: [Arrow Keys] or [WASD]
Lift & Throw & Plant: [Z] or [O]
Dig & Attack: [X] or [P]

Design, Art, Music, Sound and Scripting by Austin Ashley.
https://www.sadwarecomputerclub.com/
